title: Add UPI QR Code and Bank Details to Donation Section

requirements.summary: Add UPI payment panel with QR code, copyable UPI ID, and supported apps list to DonationSection
acceptanceCriteria: DonationSection shows a UPI QR code image for UPI ID 76800701@ubin
UPI ID '76800701@ubin' is displayed as copyable text with a copy icon button
Clicking copy button copies the UPI ID to clipboard and shows a toast confirmation
Supported UPI apps (Paytm, Google Pay, PhonePe) are listed beneath the QR code
Panel uses the existing maroon (#632626) and gold (#dacc96) color tokens

file_operations.description: Add a UPI payment panel section alongside the existing donation form. Display the generated QR code image from frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr-code.dim_400x500.png with 'Scan & Pay' heading. Include copyable UPI ID text '76800701@ubin' with a copy button that triggers navigator.clipboard.writeText and shows a toast via the Sonner toast function. List supported UPI apps (Paytm, Google Pay, PhonePe, and any UPI app) beneath the QR code. Style the panel using existing maroon/gold palette tokens from Tailwind config. Implement copy-to-clipboard functionality with error handling and toast notifications.

requirements.summary: Add Bank Details card with copyable account information to DonationSection
acceptanceCriteria: Bank Details card is visible in the DonationSection below or alongside the UPI panel
Account Name 'Gausiya Ashrafiya Foundation' is displayed with a copy button
Account Number '353901010037412' is displayed with a copy button
IFSC Code 'UBIN0535397' is displayed with a copy button
Each copy button copies the respective value to clipboard and shows a toast
Card header includes a bank/building icon and 'Bank Details' label
Card uses the maroon/gold color palette consistent with the rest of the app

file_operations.description: Add a Bank Details card below or adjacent to the UPI panel. Display three labeled fields: Account Name 'Gausiya Ashrafiya Foundation', Account Number '353901010037412', and IFSC Code 'UBIN0535397'. Each field must have an individual copy button that copies the exact value to clipboard using navigator.clipboard.writeText and displays a toast confirmation. Include a bank/building icon (from lucide-react or similar) in the card header with 'Bank Details' label. Style the card consistently with maroon/gold palette using Tailwind classes from the existing config. Ensure all values match the constraints exactly as specified.

requirements.summary: Wire the generated UPI QR code image asset into the DonationSection UI
acceptanceCriteria: A QR code image is rendered in the UPI payment panel of DonationSection
The QR code card has a white background with rounded corners
'SCAN & PAY' heading appears above the QR code
UPI ID text '76800701@ubin' appears below the QR code image
BHIM UPI branding label is shown beneath the UPI ID

file_operations.description: Import and render the generated UPI QR code image from frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr-code.dim_400x500.png inside the UPI payment panel. Wrap the image in a white rounded card container. Display 'SCAN & PAY' heading above the QR code image using bold text. Show the UPI ID '76800701@ubin' as text beneath the QR code. Include a BHIM UPI branding reference below the UPI ID text. Use responsive image sizing and ensure the card layout matches the design requirements with proper spacing and alignment within the existing maroon/gold color scheme.
